text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu liyastadhinkumu alladhina malakat aymanukum wa-alladhina lam yablughu l-huluma minkum thalatha marratin min qabli salati l-fajri wahina tadaʿuna thiyabakum mina l-zahirati wamin baʿdi salati l-ʿishai thalathu ʿawratin lakum laysa ʿalaykum wala ʿalayhim junahun baʿdahunna tawwafuna ʿalaykum baʿdukum ʿala baʿdin kadhalika yubayyinu l-lahu lakumu l-ayati wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun
